explains: adj. 使人困惑的；令人产生混乱的
v. 使迷惑（bewilder 的 ing 形式）

sentences.en: There is a bewildering variety of software available.
sentences.cn: 各种可供挑选的软件使人目不暇接。

sentences.en: A glance along his bookshelves reveals a bewildering array of interests.
sentences.cn: 扫一眼他的书架就可以看出他杂七杂八的兴趣爱好。

sentences.en: As the deadline approached she experienced a bewildering array of emotions.
sentences.cn: 随着最后期限的临近，她心绪变得纷繁复杂起来。
